item.title: Autoregressive Image Diffusion: Generation of Image Sequence and Application in MRI
item.description: Autoregressive Image Diffusion (AID) generates coherent MRI image sequences from undersampled data, outperforming standard diffusion models by exploiting inter-image dependencies.
